title: (x) Just redesigned Hong Kong Tatler - Corundum Titling {Angel}
content:
Help me guys: never seen this beautiful serif before. The italic is fabulous!  
knap

comments.content: Probably new weights of Joshua Darden's Corundum.

You're right, Angel - that's Corundum. Just wonder if display weights are on sale now (if not custom job).  
knap
Yup; looks like a to-be-released titling weight, just like Freight Display and Big were released after the initial Freight families.
